description.zh-cn: 美国海军旗下的远洋舰队之一，隶属于美国太平洋舰队。司令部设在日本横须贺港，是目前美国最大的海外前线投送部队，曾在朝鲜战争、越南战争和台湾海峡危机中扮演关键角色。
description.en: One of the forward-deployed naval forces of the United States Navy, subordinate to the United States Pacific Fleet. Headquartered at Yokosuka, Japan, it is the largest of the U.S. Navy's forward-deployed fleets and has played a key role in the Korean War, Vietnam War, and Taiwan Strait crises.

description.zh-cn: 美国武装力量的海上军种，第七舰队是其下属的编号舰队之一。
description.en: The maritime service branch of the United States Armed Forces. The Seventh Fleet is one of its numbered fleets.

description.zh-cn: 美国海军在太平洋地区的主要作战力量，是第七舰队的上级指挥单位。
description.en: The main combat force of the United States Navy in the Pacific region, and the superior command unit of the Seventh Fleet.

description.zh-cn: 美国的联合作战司令部之一，负责印太地区的军事行动，美国太平洋舰队隶属于该司令部。
description.en: One of the unified combatant commands of the United States, responsible for military operations in the Indo-Pacific region. The U.S. Pacific Fleet is subordinate to this command.

description.zh-cn: 位于日本横须贺市的美国海军基地，是第七舰队的司令部所在地。
description.en: A United States Navy base located in Yokosuka, Japan, which serves as the headquarters of the Seventh Fleet.

description.zh-cn: 美国海军上将，曾在第二次世界大战期间指挥第七舰队。
description.en: An admiral in the United States Navy who commanded the Seventh Fleet during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战中，以日本为首的轴心国和以美国为首的同盟国之间在太平洋及其周边地区进行的战争。第七舰队在此期间成立。
description.en: The theater of World War II that was fought in the Pacific and its surrounding areas between the Axis powers led by Japan and the Allied powers led by the United States. The Seventh Fleet was established during this period.

description.zh-cn: 美国陆军五星上将，在莱特湾海战期间，第七舰队归其指挥的西南太平洋方面军管辖。
description.en: A five-star general in the United States Army. During the Battle of Leyte Gulf, the Seventh Fleet was under the command of his Southwest Pacific Area.

description.zh-cn: 二战期间盟军在西南太平洋战区的司令部，由麦克阿瑟将军指挥，在莱特湾海战期间曾指挥第七舰队。
description.en: The Allied command in the South West Pacific theatre of World War II, commanded by General Douglas MacArthur. It had command over the Seventh Fleet during the Battle of Leyte Gulf.

description.zh-cn: 1950年至1953年间在朝鲜半岛发生的战争。第七舰队参与了此次战争，并在战后开始介入台湾海峡局势。
description.en: A war fought on the Korean Peninsula from 1950 to 1953. The Seventh Fleet participated in this war and began its involvement in the Taiwan Strait situation thereafter.

description.zh-cn: 1955年至1975年间发生在越南、老挝和柬埔寨的战争，第七舰队参与其中。
description.en: A war that occurred in Vietnam, Laos, and Cambodia from 1955 to 1975, in which the Seventh Fleet participated.

description.zh-cn: 1991年由美国领导的联军为解放被伊拉克占领的科威特而进行的战争，第七舰队参与了此次军事行动。
description.en: A war waged by coalition forces led by the United States in 1991 to liberate Kuwait from Iraqi occupation. The Seventh Fleet participated in this military operation.

description.zh-cn: 美国第33任总统。在朝鲜战争爆发后，他下令第七舰队进入台湾海峡，实行台湾海峡中立化政策。
description.en: The 33rd President of the United States. After the outbreak of the Korean War, he ordered the Seventh Fleet into the Taiwan Strait to implement the Taiwan Strait Neutralization policy.

description.zh-cn: 1950年朝鲜战争爆发后，美国总统杜鲁门宣布的一项政策，旨在防止中国内战蔓延至台湾，并命令第七舰队执行此任务。
description.en: A policy announced by U.S. President Truman after the outbreak of the Korean War in 1950, aimed at preventing the Chinese Civil War from spreading to Taiwan, with the Seventh Fleet ordered to enforce it.

description.zh-cn: 亚洲东部的社会主义国家。其军队在1950年被第七舰队的台湾海峡巡逻所威慑。1996年总统选举期间，其对台导弹试射引发美国派遣航母战斗群。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia. Its military was deterred by the Seventh Fleet's Taiwan Strait patrol in 1950. During the 1996 presidential election, its missile tests against Taiwan prompted the U.S. to dispatch carrier strike groups.

description.zh-cn: 由美国第七舰队成立的特遣部队，负责在台湾海峡执行巡逻任务，以实行台湾海峡中立化政策。
description.en: A task force established by the U.S. Seventh Fleet responsible for patrol missions in the Taiwan Strait to implement the Taiwan Strait Neutralization policy.

description.zh-cn: 美国海军少将，台湾巡防队（福尔摩沙海峡舰队）的第一任指挥官。
description.en: A Rear Admiral in the U.S. Navy and the first commander of the Formosa Patrol (Formosa Strait Force).

description.zh-cn: 1955年中华民国国军在美国第七舰队的协助下，将大陈岛上的军民撤退至台湾的行动。
description.en: An operation in 1955 where the Republic of China Armed Forces, with the assistance of the U.S. Seventh Fleet, evacuated military personnel and civilians from the Dachen Islands to Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的国家武装力量。在1955年的大陈岛撤退行动中与第七舰队合作，并在1958年的八二三炮战中得到第七舰队的护航补给。
description.en: The national armed forces of the Republic of China. Cooperated with the Seventh Fleet during the 1955 Dachen Islands evacuation and received escort for supplies from the Seventh Fleet during the 1958 Second Taiwan Strait Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 美国与中华民国在冷战时期签订的军事同盟条约。该条约的签订促成了美军协防台湾司令部的成立。
description.en: A mutual defense treaty signed between the United States and the Republic of China during the Cold War. The signing of this treaty led to the establishment of the U.S. Taiwan Defense Command.

description.zh-cn: 根据《中美共同防御条约》于1955年在台湾成立的美军司令部，首任司令由时任第七舰队司令蒲赖德中将担任。
description.en: A U.S. military command established in Taiwan in 1955 under the Sino-American Mutual Defense Treaty. Its first commander was the then-commander of the Seventh Fleet, Vice Admiral Alfred M. Pride.

zh-cn: 亚佛雷德·梅尔维勒·普莱德

description.zh-cn: 美国海军中将，曾任第七舰队司令，并兼任首任美军协防台湾司令部司令。
description.en: A Vice Admiral in the U.S. Navy who served as commander of the Seventh Fleet and concurrently as the first commander of the U.S. Taiwan Defense Command.

description.zh-cn: 1958年发生在台湾海峡的军事冲突，期间美国第七舰队为中华民国海军的补给船队提供护航。
description.en: A military conflict in the Taiwan Strait in 1958, during which the U.S. Seventh Fleet provided escorts for the supply convoys of the Republic of China Navy.

description.zh-cn: 美国第42任总统。在1996年台湾海峡导弹危机期间，他下令第七舰队的航母战斗群进入台湾附近海域。
description.en: The 42nd President of the United States. During the 1996 Taiwan Strait missile crisis, he ordered Seventh Fleet carrier strike groups into the waters near Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 东亚的一个岛屿。在1996年总统选举期间，中国大陆对其外海发射导弹，引发了台海危机。
description.en: An island in East Asia. During its 1996 presidential election, mainland China's missile launches off its coast triggered the Taiwan Strait Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 东亚岛国，是美国第七舰队的主要驻扎地。由于国内民众普遍反对核武器，影响了美国海军在该地区部署核动力航母的决策。
description.en: An island country in East Asia, and the main basing location for the U.S. Seventh Fleet. Public opposition to nuclear weapons in the country influenced the U.S. Navy's decision-making regarding the deployment of nuclear-powered aircraft carriers in the region.

description.zh-cn: 美国海军的一艘常规动力航空母舰，曾长期作为第七舰队的核心力量驻扎在日本。于2008年结束前沿部署任务，后由乔治·华盛顿号接替。
description.en: A conventionally powered aircraft carrier of the U.S. Navy that was long stationed in Japan as the core of the Seventh Fleet. It ended its forward-deployment mission in 2008 and was subsequently replaced by the USS George Washington.

nodes.id: 乔治·华盛顿号航空母舰

zh-cn: 乔治·华盛顿号航空母舰

description.zh-cn: 美国海军的核动力航空母舰。2008年接替小鹰号成为首艘驻扎在日本的核动力航母。2015年由罗纳德·里根号接替，2024年完成大修后重返第七舰队。
description.en: A nuclear-powered aircraft carrier of the U.S. Navy. In 2008, it replaced the USS Kitty Hawk, becoming the first nuclear-powered carrier to be stationed in Japan. It was replaced by the USS Ronald Reagan in 2015 and returned to the Seventh Fleet in 2024 after completing its overhaul.

description.zh-cn: 美国海军的核动力航空母舰。于2015年接替返回美国进行大修的乔治·华盛顿号，成为第七舰队的旗舰。
description.en: A nuclear-powered aircraft carrier of the U.S. Navy. In 2015, it replaced the USS George Washington, which returned to the U.S. for an overhaul, becoming the flagship of the Seventh Fleet.

description.zh-cn: 北美洲的联邦共和国，于1943年组建了第七舰队。
description.en: A federal republic in North America that formed the Seventh Fleet in 1943.

description.zh-cn: 美国第七舰队隶属于美国太平洋舰队。
description.en: The U.S. Seventh Fleet is subordinate to the U.S. Pacific Fleet.

description.zh-cn: 美国太平洋舰队隶属于美国印太司令部。
description.en: The U.S. Pacific Fleet is subordinate to the U.S. Indo-Pacific Command.

description.zh-cn: 美国第七舰队是美国海军旗下的舰队之一。
description.en: The U.S. Seventh Fleet is one of the fleets under the United States Navy.

description.zh-cn: 太平洋战争爆发后，美国于1943年3月将西南太平洋的舰队改编为第七舰队。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Pacific War, the United States reorganized its fleet in the Southwest Pacific into the Seventh Fleet in March 1943.

description.zh-cn: 在1944年秋的莱茵泰湾海战中，第七舰队归属于麦克阿瑟将军指挥的西南太平洋方面军。
description.en: During the Battle of Leyte Gulf in the autumn of 1944, the Seventh Fleet was subordinate to the Southwest Pacific Area command under General MacArthur.

description.zh-cn: 道格拉斯·麦克阿瑟是西南太平洋方面军的指挥官。
description.en: Douglas MacArthur was the commander of the Southwest Pacific Area.

description.zh-cn: 美国第七舰队参加了朝鲜战争。
description.en: The U.S. Seventh Fleet participated in the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 美国第七舰队参加了越南战争。
description.en: The U.S. Seventh Fleet participated in the Vietnam War.

description.zh-cn: 美国第七舰队参加了波斯湾战争。
description.en: The U.S. Seventh Fleet participated in the Gulf War.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争的爆发促使美国总统杜鲁门宣告台湾海峡中立化。
description.en: The outbreak of the Korean War prompted U.S. President Truman to declare the neutralization of the Taiwan Strait.

description.zh-cn: 美国总统杜鲁门宣告了台湾海峡中立化政策。
description.en: U.S. President Truman announced the Taiwan Strait Neutralization policy.

description.zh-cn: 作为台湾海峡中立化政策的一部分，杜鲁门总统下令第七舰队进入台湾海峡。
description.en: As part of the Taiwan Strait Neutralization policy, President Truman ordered the Seventh Fleet into the Taiwan Strait.

description.zh-cn: 第七舰队奉命进入台湾海峡，以吓阻中国人民解放军对台湾的任何潜在行动。
description.en: The Seventh Fleet was ordered into the Taiwan Strait to deter any potential actions by the People's Liberation Army against Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 1950年8月4日，第七舰队成立了第77.3特遣支队，作为“台湾巡防队”，以执行台湾海峡的巡逻任务。
description.en: On August 4, 1950, the Seventh Fleet established Task Group 77.3 as the 'Formosa Patrol' to carry out patrol missions in the Taiwan Strait.

description.zh-cn: 托马斯·豪威尔·宾福德是台湾巡防队的第一任指挥官。
description.en: Thomas Howell Binford was the first commander of the Formosa Patrol.

description.zh-cn: 1955年，美国第七舰队协助中华民国国军进行大陈岛军民的撤退行动。
description.en: In 1955, the U.S. Seventh Fleet assisted the Republic of China Armed Forces in the evacuation of military personnel and civilians from the Dachen Islands.

description.zh-cn: 1955年，中华民国国军与美国第七舰队合作，执行了大陈岛军民的撤退行动。
description.en: In 1955, the Republic of China Armed Forces, in cooperation with the U.S. Seventh Fleet, carried out the evacuation of military personnel and civilians from the Dachen Islands.

description.zh-cn: 《中美共同防御条约》的签订直接促成了美军协防台湾司令部于1955年的成立。
description.en: The signing of the Sino-American Mutual Defense Treaty directly led to the establishment of the U.S. Taiwan Defense Command in 1955.

description.zh-cn: 蒲赖德是美军协防台湾司令部的第一任司令。
description.en: Alfred M. Pride was the first commander of the U.S. Taiwan Defense Command.

description.zh-cn: 蒲赖德在担任美军协防台湾司令部首任司令时，同时也是第七舰队的司令。
description.en: While serving as the first commander of the U.S. Taiwan Defense Command, Alfred M. Pride was also the commander of the Seventh Fleet.

description.zh-cn: 在1958年的八二三炮战中，第七舰队为中华民国海军的补给船只提供了护航。
description.en: During the 1958 Second Taiwan Strait Crisis, the Seventh Fleet provided escorts for the supply ships of the Republic of China Navy.

description.zh-cn: 在1996年台湾首次总统民选期间，中国大陆对台湾外海发射导弹，制造了战争恐慌。
description.en: During Taiwan's first popular presidential election in 1996, mainland China launched missiles off the coast of Taiwan, creating a war scare.

description.zh-cn: 为应对1996年台海导弹危机，美国总统比尔·克林顿下令第七舰队航母战斗群开进台湾周边海域。
description.en: In response to the 1996 Taiwan Strait missile crisis, U.S. President Bill Clinton ordered Seventh Fleet carrier strike groups into the waters surrounding Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 由于日本民众普遍反对核动力武器，美国海军曾长期避免向第七舰队派驻核动力航空母舰，而选择了常规动力的小鹰号。
description.en: Due to widespread public opposition to nuclear-powered weapons in Japan, the U.S. Navy for a long time avoided deploying nuclear-powered aircraft carriers to the Seventh Fleet, opting for the conventionally powered USS Kitty Hawk instead.

relationships.target: 乔治·华盛顿号航空母舰

description.zh-cn: 小鹰号航空母舰于2008年除役，其在日本前沿部署的任务空缺由核动力的乔治·华盛顿号航空母舰接替。
description.en: The USS Kitty Hawk was decommissioned in 2008, and its forward-deployment role in Japan was taken over by the nuclear-powered USS George Washington.

relationships.source: 乔治·华盛顿号航空母舰

description.zh-cn: 乔治·华盛顿号航空母舰于2015年返回美国进行大修，其任务由隆纳·雷根号航空母舰接替。
description.en: The USS George Washington returned to the United States for an overhaul in 2015, and its duties were taken over by the USS Ronald Reagan.
